## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Objectives


::: {.cell}

:::


1. Learners can render a Quarto file to an output file in HTML, PDF and DOCX format.
2. Learners can list the six elements of the data science lifecycle.
3. Learners can identify four components of a Quarto file (YAML, code chunk, R code, markdown).

## {{< fa book >}} Readings

1. Read [R for Data Science - Section 1 - Introduction](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/intro) through **Section 1.3.3**
2. Read [R for Data Science - Whole game](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/whole-game)
3. Read [R for Data Science - Section 3 - Workflow basics](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/workflow-basics)
